name: One Good Room(s) GAM 1111 SP22
description:
ONE GOOD ROOM

This project is from GAM 1111 AAA Game Development Packages from the Spring of 2022. In this first-year game design course, each student designed a 1000 x 1000 x 1000 cm room with a unique theme.

ROOMS

1: Detective Room
2: Brochures
3: Target Practice
4: Glowing Orbs
5: Doom
6: Family Guy Living Room
7: Pagoda
8: Konami Code
9: The Forbidden Button
10: The Code
11: Production Studio
12: The Glowings
13: Simple Hall
14: Behind the Walls
15: Battery Warehouse
16: Glass Doors
17: The Library
18: Sacred Eggs
19: Prison Escape
20: NYC Studio

DOWNLOAD

Download the zip, unzip anywhere, double-click the .exe.

PLAY

WASD movement, left-click to shoot, esc = quit

GITHUB

Feel free to download the source project files:

https://github.com/briancheagney/GAM1111_SP22
